subject: Attention Dear,
body:
Attention Dear,
I wish to bring to you a high level partnership investment opportunity
that requires a capable and successful entrepreneur with sound
professional experience in fund cum investment management. The
investment capital involved in this project is a total of USD 68
MILLION.
The processing and transfer of the investment capital is scheduled to
take place in Ghana where the investment capital is domiciled in a
bank.
A Round  Ticket with fully paid hotel accommodation for 3 nights in a
Hotel will be arranged
for your trip to Ghana where this transaction as described herein will
be executed since your presence is required for KYC.
The investment capital in question is currently in the coffers of a
financial institution in Ghana and you are required to visit the
financial institution while you are here in Ghana for physical
verification and confirmation of the availability of the investment
capital and be informed that this transaction will be executed within
the ambit of the Financial Laws of both countries.
If you have the capacity to work with us on this potential
opportunity, feel free to contact me with a full introduction of
yourself and Company.
Thanks
Best Regards,
Mohamed Nassary,

subject: Re:   Attention Dear,
body:
Dear Mohamed Nassary,

Thank you for your email and the opportunity. However, I would need more information about the nature of the investment, the expected return on investment (ROI), and the risk involved. 

Could you please provide a detailed proposal or business plan? This will help me understand better and make an informed decision.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Bobby
